name: Jungle Surfers: Endless Run
description:
Jungle Surfers: Jake Escapes Jungle, Endless Runner for kids is a very exciting and challenging patrol game for kid. Let’s play and feel the excitement of adventures in this patrol games free.

Jungle Surfers: Jake Escapes Jungle, Endless Runner a great jungle action game by fun of endless adventure of jungle surfing.


Jungle Surfers: Jake Escapes Jungle, Endless Runner FEATURES:

+ Colorful and HD graphics
+ Cute game play and easy to control
+ Interesting music and sound effects
+ Explore the mysterious jungle
+ Amazing subway characters to select with variety of unique skills
+ Thrilling moment, fast speed

+ Subway run patrol games free to play

Let's download and play now Jungle Surfers: Jake Escapes Jungle, Endless Runner
